name: Memory (DAEDALUS)

show_trust_tags.description: Include [VERIFIED]/[SUGGESTED] tags in agent context injection

autoCapture.description: Automatically extract and store facts from conversations

autoRecall.description: Automatically inject relevant memories before each prompt build
